channel.title: Kills And Death System (RSCD)?
channel.description:
Hello, Can someone post in this topic, how to add Kills, Deaths system??
peace!

item.title: Kills And Death System (RSCD)?
item.dc:creator: @Stashah Stashah
item.description:
@Stashah wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:14, topic:246313”]You may not sell, nor buy things on these sites, with the exception of SCAR-scripts at Moparisthebest.com. So stop that now…

C R O O K S: Just some advice. Learn the basics of programming in general (and continue with some more advanced things after that), and you will see that this is not hard at all. I don’t think there are anyone who would just write a whole system for this, and give to you. But also, try to describe your problem more in detail, because that you want a ‘kill-and-death’ system in RSCDaemon, doesn’t really say much (atleast not to me).[/quote]Apparently, my dear friend, RSCD v25 doesn’t have kill-system in default. All it has is columns in database and pages in highscores. But not an actual function that would add kill info to database.

Read full topic

Explain more?: I asked for Kills, Death K/D Ratio System, (etc like storkpk have?)

And yes, i think swagger is the right person, he atleast do it… and he dont take milions for it tho…[/quote]You’re an idiot, he made it for his server, and for nobody else.

item.title: Kills And Death System (RSCD)?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You may not sell, nor buy things on these sites, with the exception of SCAR-scripts at Moparisthebest.com. So stop that now…

C R O O K S: Just some advice. Learn the basics of programming in general (and continue with some more advanced things after that), and you will see that this is not hard at all. I don’t think there are anyone who would just write a whole system for this, and give to you. But also, try to describe your problem more in detail, because that you want a ‘kill-and-death’ system in RSCDaemon, doesn’t really say much (atleast not to me).

Read full topic
